title: Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user is using Android At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the app Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a "Hide Scores" on/off switch
and it will be below the "Notifications" setting
and it will be OFF by default

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user turns the switch to ON
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Hide Scores will be enabled
and it will affect all teams at once

title: Scoreboard (Collapsed Game Cell)
custom_preconds: Given a user has Hide Scores enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Scoreboard will NOT display any scores or team records
but WILL display probable pitchers and their records

custom_steps_separated.content: Pre-Game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the game time will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Live Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then only the current inning will be displayed
along with "P:- AB:-"
(no current pitcher or batter stats)

custom_steps_separated.content: Final Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then only "Final" will be displayed
along with "W:- L:-"
(no pitcher win/loss stats)

custom_steps_separated.content: Final Game (Extra Innings; Game ended in less than 9 innings)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then "Final" will be displayed
(but NOT F/11, etc)

custom_steps_separated.content: Game Status Label (top line of game cell)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following game status labels should still appear:

Delayed
Ceremony
Umpire Review
[Team] Chal
Resume date info
MLB.TV Game of the Day
MLB PLUS Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.content: Game Status Label (top line of game cell)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following game status labels should NOT appear:

No Hitter
Perfect Game

custom_steps_separated.content: Game State
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following should still appear:

Susp
Forfeit
Postponed

title: Scoreboard (Expanded Game Cell)
custom_preconds: Given a user has Hide Scores enabled
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
and expands game cells

custom_steps_separated.content: Line Score
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the line score will be empty, but will still include RHE label

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video Carousel
(live and final games)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the video carousel will be hidden for both live and final games

title: Team Page Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given a user has Hide Scores enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to a team page scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Team Page Scoreboard will not display any scores or team records

custom_steps_separated.content: Previous Game in the visible schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected: Scores will be removed

custom_steps_separated.content: Preview Game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Game Time & Probable Pitchers will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Live Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Current Inning will be displayed
Linescore & R/H/E will be blanked out

custom_steps_separated.content: Final Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
"Final" will be displayed (regardless of how many innings were played)
Linescore & R/H/E will be blanked out

title: Team Schedule
custom_preconds: Given a user has Hide Scores enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to a Team Schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then scores, team records, and player stats will be hidden by being blanked out

custom_steps_separated.content: Calendar View
custom_steps_separated.expected: Each game date will only contain the opponent

custom_steps_separated.content:
Calendar View - when a game date is tapped
(test for FINAL & LIVE games)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then scores, team records, and player stats will be hidden by being blanked out

custom_steps_separated.content: List View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Preview games will show Game Time & probable pitchers
Live games will show LIVE
Final games will show FINAL

custom_steps_separated.content: List View - when a game date is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to Gameday

title: Banner
custom_preconds: Given a user has Hide Scores enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is viewing the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a small banner indicating "Hide Scores" is turned ON

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is viewing a Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be a small banner indicating "Hide Scores" is turned ON

title: Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
and has Hide Scores enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to Gameday on a handset
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Gameday will show all score/stats info from the current game

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to Gameday on a tablet
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Gameday will show all score/stats info from the current game
